DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date the clinical encounter occurred (or started).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A collection of data variables or metadata for use with a Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) data submission. Representative examples include Laboratory (LB), Subject Characteristics (SC), and Trial Summary (TS)._The date on which a visit occurred.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A collection of data variables or metadata for use with a Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) data submission. Representative examples include Laboratory (LB), Subject Characteristics (SC), and Trial Summary (TS).

Concepts.definition: A collection of data variables or metadata for use with a Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) data submission. Representative examples include Laboratory (LB), Subject Characteristics (SC), and Trial Summary (TS).

Property.preferredDefinition: The date on which a visit occurred.

Concepts.definition: The date on which a visit occurred.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.21.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: What [is/was] the date of the
ReferenceDocuments.description: What [is/was] the date of the visit?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH PROMPT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Visit Date

ReferenceDocuments.name: DD CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date the death details assessments were reported can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the observations at that visit or the collection date can be included on the Death Detail CRF using the date (DDDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: IE CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date the inclusion and exclusion assessments were collected can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the observations at that visit or the collection date can be included on the Inclusion/Exclusion CRF using the date (IEDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EG CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of the ECG measurements were collected can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the ECG measurements at that visit, or the collection date can be included on the ECG CRF using the date (EGDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: LB CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of the laboratory tests were collected can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the laboratory tests at that visit, or the collection date can be collected on the Laboratory CRF using the date (LBDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: MI CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of the Microscopic Findings were collected can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the Microscopic Findings at that visit, or the collection date can be included on the Microscopic Findings CRF using the date (MIDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PC CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of the PK samples were collected can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the PK samples at that visit, or the collection date can be collected on the PK CRF using the date (PCDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PE CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of the physical examination can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the physical examination findings at that visit, or the collection date can be included collected on the Physical Examination CRF using the date (PEDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SC CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of the subject characteristics were collected can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the subject characteristics at that visit, or the collection date can be included on the Subject Characteristics CRF using the date (SCDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: RP CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of the reproductive system findings were collected can be determined from the Visit Data variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the reproductive system findings at that visit, or the collection date can be included on the Reproductive System Findings CRF using the date (RPDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SR CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of the skin response measurements were collected can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the skin response measurements at that visit, or the collection date can be included on the Skin Response CRF using the date (SRDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: VS CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of the Vital Signs measurements were collected can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the observations at that visit, or the collection date can be included on the Vital Signs CRF using the Vital Signs Date (VSDAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the [date/start date] of the visit using DD-MON-YYYY format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: N/A
ReferenceDocuments.description: This field is not an SDTM variable. The date of a measurement, test, observation can be determined from the date/time of visit (VISDAT/VISTIM) and then concatenating the CDASH VISDAT/VISTIM components and populating the SDTMIG variable DADTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date the drug accountability assessments were collected can be determined from the Visit Date variable (VISDAT) and applying that date to all of the observations at that visit, or the collection date can be included on the Drug Accountability CRF using the date (DADAT) field.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of follow up

ReferenceDocuments.name: AMC Question Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of last response assessment

ReferenceDocuments.name: AMC Question Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Missed Visit Date

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of exam:

ReferenceDocuments.name: AMC CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of visit
